Reference version 0.1.0

WebHDFS Operations

Helper functions to issue WebHDFS commands and process results

hdfs_delete

Delete a file or directory

hdfs_get hdfs_put

Generic functions to perform HTTP GET or PUT requests of a WebHDFS operation

hdfs_ls clean_liststatus_columns

List a directory

hdfs_makedir

Make a directory

hdfs_open

Open and read a file

hdfs_rename

Rename a file or directory

hdfs_summary

Get content summary of a directory

hdfs_timestamp_to_posix

Convert HDFS file timestamps to POSIX

unlist_carefully

Unlist an object to the innermost data.frame

Settings

Functions to help configure cluster access

get_setting

Setting getter

get_webhdfs_url

Build an active URL for WebHDFS

set_cluster get_cluster

Specify a Hadoop cluster

set_name_node_url get_name_node_url set_webhdfs_port get_webhdfs_port set_webhdfs_suffix get_webhdfs_suffix

Manually specify cluster settings for namenode

apply_default_configurations set_return_type get_return_type set_user get_user guess_user

WebHDFS Options

is_namenode_active

Test whether the provided namenode is active
